item.title: The human harbor: Navigating identity and meaning in the AI age
item.description: The future is marked by deepening uncertainty about our place in it, and by growing ambiguity about the nature of human purpose itself.

item.title: Stop vetting engineers like it’s 2021 — the AI-native workforce has arrived
item.description: Jobs will fade and rise due to AI. But those who learn to screen, train and build dev teams around AI-enabled talent will write the future.

item.title: Building voice AI that listens to everyone: Transfer learning and synthetic speech in action
item.description: Enterprises adopting voice AI must consider not just usability, but inclusion. Supporting users with disabilities is a market opportunity.

item.title: Moonshot AI’s Kimi K2 outperforms GPT-4 in key benchmarks — and it’s free
item.description: Chinese AI startup Moonshot releases open-source Kimi K2 model that outperforms OpenAI and Anthropic on coding tasks with breakthrough agentic capabil...

item.title: A new paradigm for AI: How ‘thinking as optimization’ leads to better general-purpose models
item.description: A new AI model learns to "think" longer on hard problems, achieving more robust reasoning and better generalization to novel, unseen tasks.
